import java.util.Arrays;
//simplest way to print the array as string.
//or convert an array to strings in java


public class Strings {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		String[] stringArray= {"My","name","is","Rubina","!"};//Array consists of string as its array element
        String s1=convert_arr_to_str(stringArray);
        System.out.println("Converted array to string using Arrays.toString(): "+s1);
	}

	public static String convert_arr_to_str(String[] stringArray) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		return Arrays.toString(stringArray);
	}
}
